title: Watch: Bernard Kerr does it again w/ third victory at Red Bull Hardline 2021
content:
That’s a wrap on Red Bull Hardline 2021. In spite of qualifiers being cancelled due to high winds, the finals went off smoothly in glorious, sunny conditions the next day. Also, in spite of managing to unclip from his pedal over the massive road gap, Bernard Kerr managed to hold it together to come home with the victory.

Last week, we saw the course from Bernard’s perspective — but that was at a pace leisurely enough that he could talk us through the features. What does it look like at race speed? Check it out above.
